'''Pervinca Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Pervinca was the third child and youngest daughter of [[Thain]] [[Paladin Took II]] and [[Eglantine Banks]], and elder sister to [[Peregrin Took]].

In {{TA|3001}} she was a guest at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>

==Etymology==
[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/pervinca Pervinca] refers to periwinkle, trailing or erect evergreen plants such as the European creeper.<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Pervinca Took.jpg|thumb|left|150px|Pervinca Took in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Pervinca is found at the [[Great Smials]] in [[Tuckborough]]. She is tired of her relative [[Adelard Took]]'s lessons on family history, and helps her cousins Isembard and Imbert to play tricks on him.
